CustomField.description: Indicates which level of approval is required based on a predetermined scale. The gap between the quote margin guidance and actual quote margin determines the required approval level: - up to 5% - Level 1 - between 5% and 10% - Level 2 (10%) - above 10% - Level 3
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Indicates which level of approval is required based on a predetermined scale. The gap between the quote margin guidance and actual quote margin determines the required approval level: - up to 5% - Level 1 - between 5% and 10% - Level 2 (10%) - above 10% - Level 3
CustomField.label: Approval Level Required
